1.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, Monica, Phoebe, Ross, Joey, and Rachel areNEWLINEthere, Joey is demonstrating a card trick.

lines.Line: Okay, pick a card, any card. (Monica picks one) All right, now memorizeNEWLINEit. Show to everybody. Got it
All right, give it back to me. (takes the card back, but he looks at theNEWLINEcard before he puts it back in the deck, he holds the deck to his forehead, and thinks aNEWLINElittle while) 5 of hearts
Wow. Joey, (sarcastically) how do you do it
I can’t tell you that, no
I can’t tell you that, no
I can’t tell you that, no

lines.Character: (We hear some knocking coming from the ceiling
lines.Line: We hear some knocking coming from the ceiling.
Ah, somebody’s at the door on the ceiling
Ah, somebody’s at the door on the ceiling
Noo, that’s our unbelievably loud upstairs neighbor
He took up the carpet, and now you can hear everything
He took up the carpet, and now you can hear everything
Why don’t you go up there and ask him to ‘step lightly,NEWLINEplease?
I have like five times, but the guy is so charming, that I go up thereNEWLINEto yell and then I end up apologizing to him
Ooh, that is silly. (gets up) I’ll go up there, I’ll tell himNEWLINEto keep it down
Ooh, that is silly. (gets up) I’ll go up there, I’ll tell himNEWLINEto keep it down

All right, all right, all right, all right, all right, you really wannaNEWLINEknow how I did it, I’ll show ya. When you handed me back the card, what youNEWLINEdidn’t see was, I looked at it so fast that it was invisible to the naked eye. (picksNEWLINEup a card and quickly looks at it) I just did it. (does it again) I just did it, again.NEWLINEHere, I’ll slow it down so that you guys can see it. (looks and the card in slowNEWLINEmotion

lines.Character: (We hear Phoebe knock at the door upstairs, and the guy answer it
lines.Line: We hear Phoebe knock at the door upstairs, and the guy answer it.
(muffled through the floor) Yeah, look I was with my friend downstairsNEWLINEand we hear everything up here that you do, and I am sick and tired... (I tired but theNEWLINErest is unintelligible)
(jumping up from reading her magazine) Yeah, right away Mr. Kaplan
I’m not supposed to drink coffee, it makes me gassy
I’m not supposed to drink coffee, it makes me gassy
I’ll bet your thinking, ‘What’s an intelligent girlNEWLINEwho wants to be in fashion, doing making coffee?’ Eh
Well, don’t think I haven’t noticed your potential. Well,NEWLINEI’ve got a project for you that’s a lot more related to fashion. How does thatNEWLINEsound
Come on over here, sweetheart. (they walk over to a storage closet
Oh thank you so much Mr. Kaplan, thank you so much
Oh thank you so much Mr. Kaplan, thank you so much
(opening the closet door revealing that it’s full of tangled upNEWLINEhangers.) I need these hangers separated ASAP. (she is stunned) You’re welcome

3.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, it’s Joey’s party.

lines.Line: Hey Gunther. Hi. (to Phoebe) I mean you’re going out on a date withNEWLINEthe noisy guy upstairs
I know, he’s too charming, but if you two start going out, thenNEWLINEit’s just gonna make it so much harder for me to hate him

Well, you’re just gonna have to try

lines.Character: (Camera cuts to show Chandler giving a Jello shot to the ceramic dog and holding anNEWLINEempty tray of Jello shots
lines.Line: Camera cuts to show Chandler giving a Jello shot to the ceramic dog and holding anNEWLINEempty tray of Jello shots.

lines.Character: (Chandler sticks out is tongue and it’s a horrible shade of green
lines.Line: Chandler sticks out is tongue and it’s a horrible shade of green.

Yeah, Jell-o just like Mom used to make
Yeah, Jell-o just like Mom used to make
(entering, to Ross) The most unbelievable thing happened to me today

Hi! So I’m out having lunch at Monica’s and this guy startsNEWLINEtalking to me, and it turns out he works for a buyer at Bloomingdale’s andNEWLINEthere happens to be an opening in his department. So I gave him my phone number andNEWLINEhe’s gonna call me this weekend to see if he can get me an interview
What, so this guy is helping you for no apparent reason
And he’s, he’s a total stranger
Yeah! His name is um, Mark something
Yeah! His name is um, Mark something
Huh. Sounds like Mark Something wants to have some sex
Well, I’m just saying, I mean why else would he just, y'know, swoopNEWLINEin out of nowhere for no reason
Hey, Joey. Are men ever nice to strange women for no reason
Thank you. (to Rachel) So did you ah, did you tell Mark Something aboutNEWLINEme
I didn’t have to, because I was wearing my ‘I heart Ross’NEWLINEsandwich board and ringing my bell
(entering) Joey!!! Happy Birthday!! (all 7 of them lookNEWLINEalmost identical
(to Monica) Okay, how many of that girl are you seeing
How hammered are you? Huh? These, these are Joey’s sisters
(to one of his sisters, Cookie) Hey
Hey. What are we drinkin’ over here
Hey. What are we drinkin’ over here
Well, I have ah, vodka and cranberry juice
Well, I have ah, vodka and cranberry juice
No kiddin,’ that’s the exact same drink I made myself rightNEWLINEafter I shot my husband
Wow. Okay, I don’t know how to talk to you
Wow. Okay, I don’t know how to talk to you
Oh, I’m taking my ex-girlfriend of my speed dialer

No-no-no-no, no, it’s a good thing. Why must we dial so speedilyNEWLINEanyway? Why must we rush through life? Why can’t we savor the precious moments? (toNEWLINEone of Joey’s sisters) Those are some huge breasts you have
Yeah. So um, I-I heard about this ah, Mark guy that ah, Rachel met today
Oh yeah! So ah, kinda pretty, pretty good. He sounds like a nice, goodNEWLINEguy
Oh, he is. And he is so dreamy. I mean, y'know what, when he left INEWLINEactually used the phrase, ‘Hummina-hummina-hummina.’ (walks away

4.SceneDescription: Monica and Rachel's, continued from earlier.

lines.Line: Are you insane? I mean Joey, is going to kill you, he’s actuallyNEWLINEgoing to kill you dead

Dark, big hair, with the airplane earrings

Veronica. Look, it’s got to be Veronica, the girl in the redNEWLINEskirt. I definitely stuck my tongue down her throat

Hey. (they all walk away from Chandler
Come on!! (motions for Chandler to come with him
Come on!! (motions for Chandler to come with him

I just got off the phone with my sister

5.SceneDescription: Chandler and Joey's, Ross is reading a letter that Chandler wrote.

lines.Line: Dear Mary-Angela. Hi. How’s it going. This is the hardest letterNEWLINEI’ve ever had to write. (to Chandler) What the hell’s a matter with you? How doNEWLINEyou think Joey’s going to react when he finds out that you blew off his sister with aNEWLINEletter
Well, that’s the part where you tell him that I moved to France.NEWLINEWhen actually I’ll be in Cuba

All right, look, look, you’ve got to do this yourself, okay inNEWLINEperson. At least you know her name. You just go to the house and you ask for Mary-Angela,NEWLINEokay, when which ever one she is comes to the door, you take her for a walk, you let herNEWLINEdown easy
What if Mary-Angela comes to the door and I ask for Mary-Angela
What if Mary-Angela comes to the door and I ask for Mary-Angela

6.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Monica, Ross, and Rachel are there.

lines.Line: I can’t believe Mark didn’t call. It’s Sunday night, andNEWLINEhe didn’t call
(to Ross) Yeah, right. Look at you, you’re practically giddy
No, I’m genuinely sorry the Mark thing didn’t work out. Look,NEWLINERach, I want only good things for you
Wait a minute, why don’t you just call Mark. (they both look up inNEWLINEshock) I mean, who says you have to sit here and wait for him, you’ve got to makeNEWLINEstuff happen
But, you, you don’t want to seem too pushy
But, you, you don’t want to seem too pushy
But, you, you don’t want to seem too pushy
(to Ross) Honey, it’s not pushy, he gave her his home number
(to Rachel, as she gets his number) What, he gave you his home number? AsNEWLINEin like, to, to his home
Yeah, and you don’t mind if I call, because you only want goodNEWLINEthings for me
Yeah, and you don’t mind if I call, because you only want goodNEWLINEthings for me
That’s right good things, that-that is what I said. (glances atNEWLINEMonica

(on phone) Hello, Mark? Hi, it’s Rachel Green. (listens) Oh no,NEWLINEdon’t you apologize. (listens) Yeah, I’ll hold. (to Monica and Ross) He left myNEWLINEnumber at work, but he was helping his niece with her report on the pioneers
(on phone) Yeah, oh my God, tomorrow! That, no, it’s perfect. OhNEWLINEGod, thank you soo much. Great! Bye! (hangs up phone) I got the interview
He even offered to meet me for lunch tomorrow to prep me for it
Yeah well, if I know Mark, and I think I do, I’d expect nothing less
I got to figure out what I’m going to wear
I got to figure out what I’m going to wear
High collar and baggy pants say I’m a pro
High collar and baggy pants say I’m a pro
Yeah! Right! Okay, I’ll see you guys later. (starts to leave) WooNEWLINEhoo
You go get ‘em. (to Monica) What did I do to you? Did I hurt you inNEWLINEsome way
‘Why don’t you call him?!’ Well, thank you very much!NEWLINEY'know now he is going to prep her, y'know prep her, as in what you do when you surgicallyNEWLINEremove the boyfriend
Am I! Am I! Am I out of my mind! Am I losing my senses!! This dreamy guyNEWLINEis taking my girlfriend out for a meal

What?! Ross y'know this isn’t even about you! I mean this is aboutNEWLINERachel and something wonderful happening for her. I mean you know even if you’reNEWLINEright, what if he wants to sleep with her, does it mean he gets too
I mean don’t you trust her
I mean don’t you trust her
Then get over yourself! Grow up
Then get over yourself! Grow up

7.SceneDescription: A lobby, Ross is waiting for Rachel, after her interview.

lines.Line: (getting of the elevator and noticing Ross) Hey
Ah y'know, this building is on my paper route so I... (gives her a flower)NEWLIN
